newsitem.title: USA: Schlotzsky's CFO Charles Harvey Jr resigns.
newsitem.headline: Schlotzsky's CFO Charles Harvey Jr resigns.

text.p: Schlotzsky's Inc said on Friday that chief financial officer Charles Harvey Jr. has resigned to pursue other interests.
Harvey served as chief financial officer of the company since January 1996, the company said. Schlotzsky's said it is conducting a search for his replacement.

In the interim, controller Monica Gill will work with John Wooley, president and chief executive officer, and other executive officers of the company to fulfill duties normally performed by the chief financial officer, Schlotzsky's said.
